item.title: Fruity Knitting 001
item.description: Bring and Brag Under Construction From the Archives Knitting Technique Videos Knitting Project Videos Markdown badges Youtube | Show notes Holidaying in North Wales, hired a stone cottage, overlooking a graveyard, river and sheep. #location Taught to knit by mother and grandmother about 6 or 7. First project was a rug knitted out of autumn leaves “triangles” - approx 100 leaves - cast on, 2 rows garter stitch, then decrease slowly: one side knit two together; other side slip one, knit one, pass slip stitch over - final 3 stitches, bind off.
